name: memory-blocks
description: A full-stack memory listing website built with the MERN stack featuring JWT authentication, search functionality, and CSV export capabilities

scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.deploy:client: cd client && npm run build:prod && vercel --prod
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules

author: Memory Blocks Team
